points.title: The service uses your personal data to employ targeted third-party advertising
points.quoteText:
SONIC displays interest-based advertising using information you make available to us when you interact with us or our partners.
For example, we might look at your purchases or browsing behavior.
We might look at these activities on our website or the websites of others.

points.title: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.
points.quoteText:
We–or vendors we have hired–use several common data collection technologies including cookies, pixel tags, and similar technologies.
These technologies are used to understand the activities and behaviors of our consumers and website visitors.

points.title: There is a date of the last update of the terms
You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account
points.quoteText:
It is entirely your responsibility to maintain the confidentiality of your user name, password and other account information.
Additionally, you are entirely responsible for any and all activities that occur under your account.
You agree to notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account

points.title: This service gathers information about you through third parties
points.quoteText: We get information about you from third parties. For example, our business partners may give us information about you.

points.title: The service informs users that its privacy policy does not apply to third party websites
points.quoteText:
This site may have links to other websites that we may not own or operate.
Our privacy practices do not apply to those sites.
We don’t have control over the content of those sites or their information collection practices.

points.title: Blocking cookies may limit your ability to use the service
points.quoteText: If you configure your computer to block cookies, you may not be able to access certain functionality on our site.

points.title: The service can delete your account without prior notice and without a reason
points.quoteText: SONIC may cancel your account and delete all User Content associated with your account at any time, and without notice, if SONIC deems that you have violated these Terms, the law, or for any other reason.

points.title: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of the service
points.quoteText:
Indemnification

You agree to indemnify and hold SONIC, its parents, subsidiaries, officers, employees, agents, and SONIC Online Services website contractors and each of their officers, employees and agents harmless from any claims, damages and expenses, including reasonable attorneys' fees and costs, related to your violation of these Terms, including the Privacy Policy, or any violations thereof by your dependents or which arises from the use of User Content you submitted, posted, or otherwise provided to SONIC or the SONIC Online Services.

points.title: You can opt out of targeted advertising
points.quoteText: The third parties we work with participate in the Self-Regulatory Program for Online Behavioral Advertising. This program provides consumers with the ability to opt-out of having their online behavior recorded and used for advertising purposes. If you want to opt out, visit http://www.aboutads.info/choices/.

points.title: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at the users' sole risk
points.quoteText: THE SONIC ONLINE SERVICES AND THEIR CONTENTS ARE PROVIDED ON AN “AS IS, AS AVAILABLE” BASIS AND WITHOUT ANY WARRANTIES OR REPRESENTATIONS OF ANY KIND, WHETHER EXPRESS OR IMPLIED.

points.title: If you offer suggestions to the service, they become the owner of the ideas that you give them
points.quoteText: SONIC and its affiliated entities do not accept unsolicited ideas. Therefore, if you send any text, ideas, drawings, slogans, pictures, audio, video, or other information to SONIC through the SONIC Online Services, by e-mail or otherwise, your submission will become the property of SONIC, and SONIC will have no duty to preserve or return your submission. By sending your submission, you agree that your submission is not confidential nor proprietary and that SONIC may use and own your submission for any purpose whatsoever now and in the future without any obligation to obtain your permission or to compensate you.
